title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Case-Based Cultivation of Creative and Critical Thinking for Engineering Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Core engineering theories and practical experience (3+ years)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Analyze real-world engineering problem cases and derive at least three creative solutions.
Apply five critical evaluation criteria to validate feasibility during decision-making processes for each case.
Simulate the feasibility of proposed solutions through VR simulations and draft improvement plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
